title: Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s
medium:
Medium: silk, glass beads, plastic beads, gold cord, faux pearls, rhinestones
Technique: embroidery on satin weave
description: Pale yellow satin ground embroidered in a band outlined in rhinestones. Band contains flower design worked in faux pearls with pink and orange round beads and rhinestones outlined in gold cord.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s. Medium: silk, glass beads, plastic beads, gold cord, faux pearls, rhinestones
Technique: embroidery on satin weave. 
Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-45
